mapper.select: SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID, DOC_NO, DOC_TITL, PRJT_ID, EFCM_DATE, CUST_DMD_MTR, BSNS_CHRC_CONT, COPE_SCHM_CONT, CMPY_SLCT_WAY_CONT, CMPY_EVAL_WAY_CONT, PRTC_CMPY_PRSCD_CONT, SLS_DEPT_ID, SLS_EMP_ID, VRB_UDWG_RST_CD, VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD, SANT_ID, REG_EMP_ID, REG_DT, CHG_EMP_ID, CHG_DT FROM BPIP100T WHERE SANT_ID = #{santId}

SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID,DOC_NO, DOC_TITL, SANT_ID, EFCM_DATE, VRB_UDWG_RST_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VRB_UDWG_RST_CD',VRB_UDWG_RST_CD) AS VRB_UDWG_RST_CD_NM, VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD',VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM FROM BPIP100T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId}

SELECT PROD_TYPE_CD, PROD_TYPE_CD_NM ,LPC_AMT -- List Price ,SELL_AMT --매출금액 ,BUY_COST_AMT --매입원가금액 ,DRCST_AMT --직접원가금액 ,DREXP_AMT --직접경비금액 ,INCST_AMT --간접원가금액 ,CTMG_AMT --공헌이익금액 ,PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD', PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD) AS PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD_NM ,PUT_NOP_COUNT FROM ( SELECT PROD_TYPE_CD, SORT_SEQC, PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD, SUM(NVL(PUT_NOP_COUNT,0)) AS PUT_NOP_COUNT, ( SELECT T010.COM_CD_NM FROM ( SELECT T000.COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM000T T000 INNER JOIN ACOM020T T020 ON T000.COM_GRP_CD = T020.COM_GRP_CD WHERE T020.CLMN_NM = 'PROD_TYPE_CD' ) T000_T020 LEFT JOIN ACOM010T T010 ON T000_T020.COM_GRP_CD = T010.COM_GRP_CD WHERE T010.COM_CD = BPIP141T.PROD_TYPE_CD ) AS PROD_TYPE_CD_NM, NVL(SUM(LPC_AMT), 0) AS LPC_AMT, NVL(SUM(SELL_AMT), 0) AS SELL_AMT, NVL(SUM(BUY_COST_AMT), 0) AS BUY_COST_AMT, NVL(SUM(DRCST_AMT), 0) AS DRCST_AMT, NVL(SUM(DREXP_AMT), 0) AS DREXP_AMT, NVL(SUM(INCST_AMT), 0) AS INCST_AMT, NVL(SUM(CTMG_AMT), 0) AS CTMG_AMT FROM BPIP141T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COM_CD, SORT_SEQC FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = (SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'PROD_TYPE_CD') ) ON BPIP141T.PROD_TYPE_CD = COM_CD WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} GROUP BY PROD_TYPE_CD, SORT_SEQC, PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD ) ORDER BY SORT_SEQC

SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID, INCST_AMT, -- 간접원가(간접비) CTMG_AMT, -- 공헌이익 LPC_AMT, -- List Price(소계) SPLY_AMT, -- 매출금액(소계) BUY_COST_AMT, -- 매입원가금액(소계) DRCST_AMT, --직접원가(소계) DREXP_AMT, -- 직접경비(소계) ( SELECT NVL(SUM(BUY_COST_AMT), 0) FROM BPIP141T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} AND PROD_TYPE_CD = 'SD' OR PROD_TYPE_CD = 'SS' OR PROD_TYPE_CD = 'TS' ) AS SVC_BUY_COST_AMT FROM ( SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID, NVL(SUM(INCST_AMT), 0) AS INCST_AMT, NVL(SUM(CTMG_AMT), 0) AS CTMG_AMT, NVL(SUM(LPC_AMT), 0) AS LPC_AMT, NVL(SUM(SELL_AMT), 0) AS SPLY_AMT, NVL(SUM(BUY_COST_AMT), 0) AS BUY_COST_AMT, NVL(SUM(DRCST_AMT), 0) AS DRCST_AMT, NVL(SUM(DREXP_AMT), 0) AS DREXP_AMT FROM BPIP141T GROUP BY VRB_ANLY_ID ) WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId}

SELECT '['|| ( SELECT COM_CD_NM FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = ( SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'SANT_FRMT_CD' ) AND COM_CD = #{santFrmtCd} ) ||'] '|| ( SELECT CUST_NM FROM CMST000T WHERE CUST_ID = APRJ000T.LAST_CUST_ID )||' / '|| PRJT_NM FROM APRJ000T WHERE PRJT_ID = #{prjtId}
SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID, PRJT_ID, SLS_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(SLS_EMP_ID) AS SLS_EMP_NM, SLS_DEPT_ID , IBIZ_DEPT_NM(SLS_DEPT_ID) AS SLS_DEPT_NM FROM BPIP100T WHERE SANT_ID = #{santId}

SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID, PRJT_ID, VRB_UDWG_RST_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VRB_UDWG_RST_CD', VRB_UDWG_RST_CD) AS VRB_UDWG_RST_CD_NM, EFCM_DATE, VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD', VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM FROM BPIP100T WHERE SANT_ID = #{santId}

SELECT BEST.REG_DT AS ANLY_DT ,BEST.FCST_PAL_ID ,BEST.DOC_NO ,BEST.DOC_TITL ,BEST.SANT_ID ,BEST.PRJT_ID ,BPIP.BOPT_ID, BPIP.BOPT_NM ,BPIP.ORDE_CUST_ID, IBIZ_CUST_NM(BPIP.ORDE_CUST_ID) AS ORDE_CUST_NM ,BEST.SUM_SPLY_AMT AS SPLY_AMT ,BEST.CTMG_AMT ,BEST.SUM_PUT_NOP_COUNT AS PUT_NOP_COUNT ,BEST.PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD', BEST.PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD) AS PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD_NM ,BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('WCT_PRBB_CD', BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD) AS WCT_PRBB_CD_NM ,BPIP.PRPS_FNSH_DATE, BPIP.BID_FNSH_DATE ,BPIP.CNTR_DATE ,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD',FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM FROM BPIP000T BPIP INNER JOIN ( SELECT FCST_PAL_ID, BOPT_ID, DOC_NO, DOC_TITL, PRJT_ID, SANT_ID, REG_DT, FCST_PAL_PRGS_STAT_CD, ( SELECT SUM(SELL_AMT) FROM BPIP141T WHERE BPIP141T.FCST_PAL_ID = BEST000T.FCST_PAL_ID AND BPIP141T.VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} GROUP BY BPIP141T.FCST_PAL_ID ) AS SUM_SPLY_AMT, ( SELECT SUM(PUT_NOP_COUNT) FROM BPIP141T WHERE BPIP141T.FCST_PAL_ID = BEST000T.FCST_PAL_ID AND BPIP141T.VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} GROUP BY BPIP141T.FCST_PAL_ID ) AS SUM_PUT_NOP_COUNT, ( SELECT PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD FROM BPIP141T WHERE BPIP141T.FCST_PAL_ID = BEST000T.FCST_PAL_ID AND BPIP141T.VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} AND PROD_TYPE_CD = 'SD' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD, ( SELECT NVL(((SUM(SELL_AMT) - SUM(BUY_COST_AMT)) - SUM(DRCST_AMT) - SUM(DREXP_AMT)) - SUM(INCST_AMT), 0) -- SUM(CTMG_AMT) FROM BPIP141T WHERE BPIP141T.FCST_PAL_ID = BEST000T.FCST_PAL_ID AND BPIP141T.VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} ) AS CTMG_AMT FROM BEST000T WHERE VRB_SLCT_RST_CD = 'A' OR VRB_SLCT_RST_CD = 'B' ) BEST ON BPIP.BOPT_ID = BEST.BOPT_ID WHERE BPIP.PRJT_ID = ( SELECT PRJT_ID FROM BPIP100T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} ) AND BEST.FCST_PAL_ID IN ( SELECT FCST_PAL_ID FROM BPIP141T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} ) AND BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD != 'D1' ORDER BY BEST.REG_DT

SELECT BEST.FCST_PAL_ID ,BEST.REG_DT AS ANLY_DT ,BEST.DOC_NO ,BEST.SANT_ID ,BPIP.PRJT_ID ,BPIP.BOPT_ID, BPIP.BOPT_NM ,BPIP.ORDE_CUST_ID, IBIZ_CUST_NM(BPIP.ORDE_CUST_ID) AS ORDE_CUST_NM ,BEST.SELL_AMT AS SPLY_AMT -- 총매출 ,(BEST.SELL_AMT - BEST.BUY_COST_AMT ) AS NSLE_AMT -- 순매출 = ( 총공급금액 - SV 외주단가금액 - 총구매금액 ) ,(BEST.SELL_AMT - BEST.BUY_COST_AMT - BEST.DRCST_AMT - BEST.DREXP_AMT - BEST.INCST_AMT) AS CTMG_AMT -- 공헌이익 ,BEST.SUM_PUT_NOP_COUNT AS PUT_NOP_COUNT -- 투입인원 ,BEST.PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD', BEST.PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD) AS PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD_NM ,BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('WCT_PRBB_CD', BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD) AS WCT_PRBB_CD_NM ,BPIP.PRPS_FNSH_DATE, BPIP.BID_FNSH_DATE, BPIP.CNTR_DATE
,CASE WHEN BEST.FCST_PAL_ID IN ( SELECT FCST_PAL_ID FROM BPIP141T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS CHECK_BOX
FROM BPIP000T BPIP INNER JOIN ( SELECT BEST000T.FCST_PAL_ID, BOPT_ID, DOC_NO, REG_DT, SANT_ID, SUM(NVL((CASE WHEN PROD_TYPE_CD = 'SD' THEN PUT_NOP_COUNT ELSE 0 END ), 0)) AS SUM_PUT_NOP_COUNT, -- 총 투입인원 'M' AS PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD,-- 투입 단위 NVL(SUM(BEST020T.LPC_AMT), 0) AS LPC_AMT, NVL(SUM(BEST020T.SELL_AMT), 0) AS SELL_AMT, NVL(SUM(BEST020T.BUY_COST_AMT), 0) AS BUY_COST_AMT, NVL(SUM(BEST020T.DRCST_AMT), 0) AS DRCST_AMT, NVL(SUM(BEST020T.DREXP_AMT), 0) AS DREXP_AMT, NVL(SUM(BEST020T.INCST_AMT), 0) AS INCST_AMT FROM BEST000T LEFT JOIN BEST020T ON BEST000T.FCST_PAL_ID = BEST020T.FCST_PAL_ID WHERE VRB_SLCT_RST_CD = 'A' OR VRB_SLCT_RST_CD = 'B' GROUP BY BEST000T.FCST_PAL_ID, BOPT_ID,DOC_NO, REG_DT, SANT_ID ) BEST ON BPIP.BOPT_ID = BEST.BOPT_ID WHERE BPIP.PRJT_ID =
( SELECT PRJT_ID FROM BPIP100T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} )
#{prjtId}
AND BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD != 'D1' ORDER BY BEST.REG_DT

SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID ,PRJT_ID ,DOC_NO, BPIP.DOC_TITL ,CUST_DMD_MTR, BSNS_CHRC_CONT, COPE_SCHM_CONT -- 고객요구사항, 사업특성내용, 대응방안내용 ,CMPY_SLCT_WAY_CONT, CMPY_EVAL_WAY_CONT, PRTC_CMPY_PRSCD_CONT -- 경쟁사분석: 업체선정방식내용, 업체평가방식내용, 참여업체현황내용 ,EFCM_DATE -- 시행일자 ,VRB_UDWG_RST_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VRB_UDWG_RST_CD', VRB_UDWG_RST_CD) AS VRB_UDWG_RST_CD_NM -- VRB심서결과코드 ,VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD', VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM -- VRB 진행상태코드 ,BPIP.SLS_DEPT_ID, IBIZ_DEPT_NM(BPIP.SLS_DEPT_ID) AS SLS_DEPT_NM, BPIP.SLS_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(BPIP.SLS_EMP_ID) AS SLS_EMP_NM , BPIP.FILE_ATTC_ID, BPIP.REG_DT, BPIP.CHG_DT ,BPIP.REG_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(BPIP.REG_EMP_ID) AS REG_EMP_NM ,BPIP.CHG_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(BPIP.CHG_EMP_ID) AS CHG_EMP_NM ,AAPR.SANT_PRGS_STAT_CD ,AAPR.SANT_NTC_DST_CD,IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('SANT_NTC_DST_CD', AAPR.SANT_NTC_DST_CD) AS SANT_NTC_DST_NM FROM BPIP100T BPIP JOIN AAPR100T AAPR ON BPIP.SANT_ID = AAPR.SANT_ID WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId}
SELECT HGRK_COM_CD AS HGRK_COM_GRP_CD, COM_CD AS COM_GRP_CD, COM_CD_NM AS COM_GRP_CD_NM FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'BP17'

SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID ,SEQ ,BLTO_ISTT_NM, DEPT_NM, CUST_NM, COPS_NM, RESO_NM, CRG_JOB_NM ,CUST_INDG_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('CUST_INDG_CD', CUST_INDG_CD) AS CUST_INDG_CD_NM ,CUST_FDL_INCLN_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('CUST_FDL_INCLN_CD', CUST_FDL_INCLN_CD) AS CUST_FDL_INCLN_CD_NM ,RMRK_CONT FROM BPIP120T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID ,VRB_ANLY_TYPE_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VRB_ANLY_TYPE_CD', VRB_ANLY_TYPE_CD) AS VRB_ANLY_TYPE_CD_NM ,VRB_ANLY_ITM_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('VRB_ANLY_ITM_CD', VRB_ANLY_ITM_CD) AS VRB_ANLY_ITM_CD_NM ,PRSCD_ANLY_CONT, RUN_SCHM_CONT, SPRT_REQ_CONT FROM BPIP150T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId}

SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID, SEQ ,CMPY_NM, STRH_CONT, WKNS_CONT, CPTT_GODS_NM ,GODS_CPTT_SUP_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('GODS_CPTT_SUP_CD', GODS_CPTT_SUP_CD) AS GODS_CPTT_SUP_CD_NM ,PRC_CPTT_SUP_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRC_CPTT_SUP_CD', PRC_CPTT_SUP_CD) AS PRC_CPTT_SUP_CD_NM FROM BPIP130T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT VRB_ANLY_ID ,SEQ ,ORG_DST_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('ORG_DST_CD', ORG_DST_CD) AS ORG_DST_CD_NM ,RVWR_DEPT_ID, IBIZ_DEPT_NM(RVWR_DEPT_ID) AS RVWR_DEPT_NM ,RVWR_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(RVWR_EMP_ID) AS RVWR_EMP_NM ,RVWR_RESO_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('RVWR_RESO_CD', RVWR_RESO_CD) AS RVWR_RESO_CD_NM ,RVWR_OFPS_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('RVWR_OFPS_CD', RVWR_OFPS_CD) AS RVWR_OFPS_CD_NM ,RVW_OPIN_CONT FROM BPIP170T WHERE VRB_ANLY_ID = #{vrbAnlyId} ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(VRB_ANLY_ID) IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(VRB_ANLY_ID) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') || '000000' END AS VRB_ANLY_ID FROM BPIP100T
SELECT IBIZ_NEW_ID('BPIP100T','VRB_ANLY_ID','YYYY######') AS VRB_ANLY_ID FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BPIP141T ( VRB_ANLY_ID, FCST_PAL_ID, PROD_TYPE_CD, LPC_AMT, SELL_AMT, BUY_COST_AMT, DRCST_AMT, DREXP_AMT, INCST_AMT, CTMG_AMT, PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD, PUT_NOP_COUNT ) SELECT #{vrbAnlyId}, #{fcstPalId}, B.PROD_TYPE_CD, NVL(SUM(B.LPC_AMT),0), NVL(SUM(B.SELL_AMT),0), --매출금액 NVL(SUM(B.BUY_COST_AMT),0), --매입원가 NVL(SUM(B.DRCST_AMT),0), --직접원가(매입외) NVL(SUM(B.DREXP_AMT),0), --직접경비 NVL(SUM(B.INCST_AMT),0), --간접원가 NVL(SUM(B.CTMG_AMT),0), --공헌이익 CASE WHEN B.PROD_TYPE_CD = 'SD' THEN 'M' ELSE NULL END PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD, --투입시간단위코드 (S/W Development인 경우만 해당) CASE WHEN B.PROD_TYPE_CD = 'SD' THEN NVL(SUM((CASE WHEN PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD = 'M' THEN 1 WHEN PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD = 'D' THEN 20 WHEN PUT_TIME_UNIT_CD = 'H' THEN 160 ELSE 1 END) * PUT_NOP_COUNT),0) ELSE NULL END AS PUT_NOP_COUNT --투입인원수 (S/W Development인 경우만 해당) FROM BEST020T B WHERE B.FCST_PAL_ID = #{fcstPalId} GROUP BY B.FCST_PAL_ID, B.PROD_TYPE_CD
mapper.update: UPDATE BPIP100T SET VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD = NVL(IBIZ_MAPP_COM_CD ('SANT_PRGS_STAT_CD', #{vrbPrgsStatCd}, 'VRB_PRGS_STAT_CD'), #{vrbPrgsStatCd} ) WHERE SANT_ID = #{santId}
